t: Brand Specialist Amazon Salary: Hourly Rate May 2025
s: Based on recent job postings on ZipRecruiter, the Brand Specialist Amazon job market in both Los Angeles, CA and the surrounding area is very active. A Brand Specialist Amazon in your area makes on average $30 per hour, or $2.19 (77.515%) more than the national average hourly salary of $28.22.

t: How Much Does Amazon Pay in 2024? (509,160 Salaries) | Glassdoor
s: Evaluating two offers and need help: 1. Amazon - CSM (L5) TC: 185k base + 30k bonus Year 1 (and 19k year 2) 18 RSUs to be vested across 4 years 2. Deloitte - Manager TC: 210k base + 20k bonus Roles are similar. 4 year return seems higher with Deloitte, considering the Base + Bonus structure.
